H0.text: Of which band was Feargal Sharkey the lead singer until 1983. The Stranglers

H1.text: Of which band was Feargal Sharkey the lead singer until 1983. The Damned

H2.text: Of which band was Feargal Sharkey the lead singer until 1983. Stiff Little Fingers

H3.text: Of which band was Feargal Sharkey the lead singer until 1983. Undertone

A4.text: Sharkey, who was born in Derry, Northern Ireland, joined the Undertones shortly after their formation in 1975.

A5.text: The band split in 1983 citing musical differences, with Sharkey pursuing a solo career and other members of the band forming That Petrol Emotion the following year.
